patterns: ^(hi|hello|hey)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;^(good morning|good afternoon|good evening)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;^(hi|hello|hey)\s+(there|assistant)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;^(hola|buenos dias|buen día|buen dia|buenas tardes|buenas noches)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$
response: Hello! I'm TechMart's virtual assistant. I can help you with store hours, products, technical support, deliveries, and more. How can I assist you?

patterns: .*what can you do.*;;;.*what do you help with.*;;;.*what are your capabilities.*;;;.*tell me about yourself.*;;;.*who are you.*;;;.*what are you.*;;;.*how can you help.*;;;.*how do you work.*;;;.*what (is|are) (your|the) (features|functions|abilities).*;;;.*qué puedes hacer.*;;;.*en qué me puedes ayudar.*;;;.*cuáles son tus capacidades.*;;;.*háblame de ti.*;;;.*quién eres.*;;;.*qué eres.*;;;.*cómo puedes ayudar.*;;;.*cómo funcionas.*
response: I'm TechMart's AI assistant! TechMart is Cuenca's premier technology store, established in 2015. We specialize in computers, laptops, smartphones, tablets, gaming equipment, and accessories from top brands. With 2 locations in Cuenca (Mall and Downtown), we offer expert advice, competitive prices, and excellent after-sales service. Our team consists of certified technicians who can help you choose the right tech for your needs. We are authorized distributors for Apple, Dell, HP, Lenovo, Samsung, and other leading brands. I can help you with product information, technical specifications, warranties, store locations, delivery service, and tech support. What would you like to know?
Absolutely! I can help you with tech products, prices, specifications, warranties, repairs, deliveries, and more. What do you need?

patterns: .*(goodbye|bye|see you|talk to you later|have a good day).*;;;^(thanks for your help|that's all|that will be all)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;.*(see you later|until next time|catch you later).*;;;^(bye|goodbye)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;.*(have a great day|have a nice day|take care).*;;;^(adiós|adios|hasta luego|nos vemos|chao)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;.*(hasta pronto|hasta la próxima).*
response: Thank you for choosing TechMart! Have a great day and see you soon!

patterns: .*(thank you|thanks|appreciate).*;;;^(perfect|great|awesome|excellent|wonderful)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;.*(thanks a lot|thank you so much|much appreciated).*;;;^(that helps|that's helpful|very helpful)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;.*(you're amazing|you're great|well done).*;;;^(gracias|muchas gracias)(\s|!|\.|\?)*$;;;.*(te lo agradezco|muy amable).*
response: You're welcome! Always happy to help with your tech needs!
Our stores are open Monday to Saturday 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM, and Sunday 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM. The Mall location is open until 9:00 PM every day.

We specialize in technology: Laptops & Computers (Dell, HP, Lenovo, Apple), Smartphones & Tablets (iPhone, Samsung, Xiaomi), Accessories (cases, chargers, headphones), Gaming (consoles, controllers), and Smart Home devices. What are you looking for?
Yes! We offer free delivery in Cuenca for orders over $100. For smaller orders, delivery is $5. Order via our website or WhatsApp +593 99 YYY YYYY. Delivery time: 24-48 hours.
We accept cash, all debit/credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Diners, AmEx), bank transfers, and installment plans (3, 6, 9, 12 months with 0% interest on selected products).

All products come with manufacturer's warranty: Laptops & computers (1 year), Smartphones (1 year), Accessories (6 months). We offer extended warranty plans. Free technical support for the first 30 days.
Yes! We offer free technical support: In-store setup assistance, phone/WhatsApp support, and remote assistance for software installation and configuration. Contact us at support@techmart-example.com
We have 2 stores in Cuenca: 1) TechMart Mall - Mall del Río, 2nd floor; 2) TechMart Downtown - Ave. Solano and Calle YYYY. Which one is more convenient for you?
Yes! We have a trade-in program. Bring your old laptop, phone, or tablet and get credit towards a new device. Value depends on condition and model. Visit any store for a free evaluation.
We sell PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and gaming accessories. We also have a selection of popular games. Check availability in-store or online.
